column1: #text=First , you need to pick out where you want to put your tree .
#text=You 're going to be digging quite a large hole , so you need to consider a few things .
#text=First of all , make sure you place your tree where it wo n't mess anything up as it grows .
#text=You want to put it somewhere where it has plenty of room to grow , with soft dirt .
#text=Next , you need to gather the tree you 're going to plant as well as a shovel .
#text=Then you 're going to dig a nice big hole .
#text=You want the entire roots of the tree to be covered sufficiently in dirt , so make sure it 's plenty big enough .
#text=Next , you place your tree in it 's hole .
#text=Make sure it 's got plenty of room .
#text=Finally , you can fill in dirt around your tree .
#text=Now you 're finished and you can watch your tree grow !
#text=Soon you 'll have a nice big tree to shade you !
